name: No Emote
description: Dissent with your head and arms.

name: This Way Emote
description: Use your arms to point out where to go

name: Yes Emote
description: Consent with your head and hand

name: Cheer Emote
description: Cheer with your arms while screaming: "Aw Yeah!

name: Fail Emote
description: Put your hand on your face while dissenting

name: Laugh Emote
description: Laugh and point with your fingers

name: Gravedigger Emote
description: Pretend to dig with a shovel using your arms

name: Exhausted Emote
description: Recover your breath while pointing up with one finger

name: Confused Emote
description: Look Around while moving your arms.

name: Freeze Frame Emote
description: Jump while raising your arm. You'll remain still in the air for a moment.

name: Tea Time Emote
description: Pretend to prepare tea with your arms.

name: High Five Emote
description: Raise your hand to perform a High Five. If another player performs the same emotes you will clap your hands.

name: Praise The Gun Emote
description: Raise your hand above your head while looking at it.
